title: [Report] nightly build with Jupyter stuck
body_html:
What happened?

When I tried to import pytorch (nightly build) in both Jupyter notebook and lab, they got stuck and I got backtraces as below.

My environment

  • PyTorch nightly build
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: Nightly 18 April version
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0 / 7
  • Jupyter lab and notebook
jupyter-client (5.2.3)
jupyter-core (4.4.0)
jupyterlab (0.32.0)
jupyterlab-launcher (0.10.5)

Backtrace log

It's a long log so I attach it.

*** Error in `/opt/.miniconda/bin/python': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fc8945c3d40 ***

error.log

body:
## What happened?

When I tried to import `pytorch` (nightly build) in both Jupyter notebook and lab, they got stuck and I got backtraces as below.

## My environment
- PyTorch nightly build
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04
- PyTorch version: Nightly 18 April version
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): `conda install -c pytorch pytorch-nightly`
- Python version: 3.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0 / 7
- Jupyter lab and notebook

```
jupyter-client (5.2.3)
jupyter-core (4.4.0)
jupyterlab (0.32.0)
jupyterlab-launcher (0.10.5)
```

## Backtrace log

It's a long log so I attach it.

```
*** Error in `/opt/.miniconda/bin/python': free(): invalid pointer: 0x00007fc8945c3d40 ***
```

[error.log](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1927896/error.log)
